name: KILLFISH
description:
Welcome to KILLFISH, an immersive gaming experience that will take you on a journey like no other. In this Action/FPS game, you'll dive into a captivating world where robots have taken control on a factory. Embark on an epic adventure filled with a unique hook mechanic that will give you freedom to explore and kill in flashy ways.

Key Features

· Fast-pace movement mechanics: Immerse yourself in a fast-pace world in which you will have to use the hook and move fast in order to kill all enemies.
· Stunning Visuals: Dive into a visually stunning world where every detail is meticulously crafted to bring KILLFISH's universe to life. From breathtaking illumination to intricately designed characters, prepare to be amazed.
· Customization Options: Tailor your gameplay to your liking with an array of customization options. Express your personal gameplay style as you explore KILLFISH's levels.
· Unique Style Meter: Kill in flashy ways to improve your score and buy the upgrades such as the explosive sniper.
